```{r library}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r setup}
getwd()
YTSData2021 <- read.csv("nyts2021.csv")
```

```{r explore}
str(YTSData2021) 
```

```{r renamecol}
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Gender" = QN2)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Grade_of_Student" = QN3)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Ever_used" = QN6)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Days_Used" = QN9)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Last_Used" = QN10)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Curiousity" = QN29)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Try" = QN30)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Try_Next_Year" = QN31)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Cigarette_Ever_Used" = QN35)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Cigarette_Days_Used" = QN38)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Cigarette_Curiosity" = QN47)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Cigarette_Try" = QN48)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Cigarette_Try_Next_Year" = QN49)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("The_Real_Cost" = QN109)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Any_Tobacco_Craving" = QN90)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Attempt_Quitting_Tobacco" = QN92)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Are_Tobacco_Products_Harmful" = QN122)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("E_Cig_Promotions_Internet" = QN128)
YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% rename("Tobacco_Promotions_Internet" = QN139)


YTSData2021 <- YTSData2021 %>% select("Gender", "Grade_of_Student", "E_Cig_Ever_used", "E_Cig_Days_Used", "E_Cig_Last_Used", "E_Cig_Curiousity", "E_Cig_Try", "E_Cig_Try_Next_Year", "Cigarette_Ever_Used", "Cigarette_Days_Used", "Cigarette_Curiosity", "Cigarette_Try", "Cigarette_Try_Next_Year", "The_Real_Cost", "Any_Tobacco_Craving", "Attempt_Quitting_Tobacco", "Are_Tobacco_Products_Harmful", "E_Cig_Promotions_Internet", "Tobacco_Promotions_Internet")
```

```{r Duplicating and saving new dataset}
YTSData2021Numbers <- YTSData2021
write.csv(YTSData2021Numbers, file = "NYTS2021DataNumbers.csv")
```

```{r Explore After Name Change}
str(YTSData2021) 
```

```{r Change Value Names Gender}
YTSData2021$Gender <- 
  as.character(YTSData2021$Gender)

YTSData2021$Gender <- trimws(YTSData2021$Gender)

YTSData2021$Gender[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="1"]<-"M"
YTSData2021$Gender[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="2"]<-"F"
```

```{r Change Value Names Grade}
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student <- 
  as.character(YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student)

YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="1"]<-"6th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="2"]<-"7th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="3"]<-"8th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="4"]<-"9th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="5"]<-"10th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="6"]<-"11th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="7"]<-"12th"
YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student[YTSData2021$Grade_of_Student=="8"]<-"Unplaced"
```

```{r Change Value Names Yes/No}

YTSData2021$E_Cig_Ever_used <-

YTSData2021$E_Cig_Ever_used[YTSData2021$E_Cig_Ever_used=="1"]<-"Yes"
```
